snippet.title: Phosphor Beta 2 (Shockwave) - Online Multiplayer 2022
snippet.description:
0:00 - 3-Player Deathmatch
6:01 - Mostly testing netcode, hit detection, game mechanics, etc...

Phosphor Beta 2 Adobe Shockwave 3D free web browser game.

How to play online in 2022:

Download the standalone version of the game from https://sites.google.com/view/legacyshockwave/shockwave-games?authuser=0
Have one player host by switching the mode to "Server" in the game settings and either port forwarding 1626 or changing the port used there.
Then have other players join them via IP by switching the mode to "Client"

Original site - http://rasterwerks.com/game/phosphor/beta2.asp
